content: crochet an adorable costume for a little one in your life with this free pattern for a onesie and hat set **what you ll need** yarn malabrigo yarn merino worsted 100% merino wool 210 yards 192 meters /100 grams 508 blue graphite 3 skeins hook us size h/8 5 0 mm us size j/10 6 0 mm notions yarn needle stitch markers ¼ yard of black snap tape skill level intermediate size onesie 6 12 months 17 18 chest hat baby toddler 14 16 head circumference shown in size 6 months gauge 16 sts and 20 row = 4 10 cm in single_crochet with larger hook
